newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative gives US$10 mln bonus to staff.
newsitem.headline: Creative gives US$10 mln bonus to staff.

text.p: Multimedia company Creative Technology Ltd said on Saturday it was giving its worldwide staff a special bonus of US$10 million.
It said in a statement the bonus has been approved by its board of directors and will be paid out to staff in two installments - in September and by January 1998.

The $10 billion bonus will have no effect on the company's future financials. It is made up of $6 million accrued in its 1996/1997 fourth quarter fiscal accounts and the other $4 million had been accrued in earlier quarters, it said.
The bonus is to reward the efforts of Creative staff who have helped the company stage a dramatic turnaound.

For the full year ended June 30, 1997, Creative posted record earnings of $167 million on sales of $1.23 billion. This is compared against a loss of $37.6 million in fiscal year ended June 30, 1996 on reveue of $1.31 billion.
